resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Use GooglePlayService as additional location provider if available
 · New: Optionally use a low power GPS mode for parts of the app which don't require high precision
 · New: Confirmation dialog for dangerous log types
 · New: Store found date of found caches when importing via GPX
 · Fix: Improved compass rotation algorithm
 · Fix: Better scaling of smilies in logbook
